channel.title: I have a really good question! and lots of people wanna know this i think!
channel.description:
:confused:Iam really confused. How can i make my server so it :confused:holds alot of people without lagg? Becaue atm i have 796mb computer ram if i make it to 2gb ram will it hold twise as much people? and stop lagg?
How does it work because example dodian has 300players on it. And it works fine it doesn't even crash at 300 lol? how did they do it?
please tell me i want to fix it becaue atm i have like 30players on my server and it laggs bit.

item.title: I have a really good question! and lots of people wanna know this i think!
item.dc:creator: @SivanScape SivanScape
item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

well iam out of luck

Read full topic

item.title: I have a really good question! and lots of people wanna know this i think!
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

Unless you get an ‘OutOfMemoryException’ every 5-10 mins, you don’t need more ram. Dodian servers are a little better and more crash resistant to wL based servers.

So, more ram is not the answer, the answer is more Bandwidth. Try contacting your ISP about increasing the Upload speed on your home network. If you don’t control your Internet at your home, (you live w/ your parents… i.e), Your out of luck…

Read full topic
